author: Opinion by Robert F. Breiman
title: The Covid-19 culprit is us, not pangolins
description: Robert F. Breiman writes that preliminary indications are that pangolins served as an intermediate host for Covid-19, but if pangolins could talk, they would claim no responsibility for the outbreaks they have been associated with. The culprit is us.
content: Dr. Robert Breiman is a professor of infectious disease and director of the Global Health Institute at Emory University. Before joining Emory, he was based in Bangladesh and Kenya with the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and led investigations and … [+5182 chars]
